description: Starting index of a string of 5 or more consecutive equal digits in decimal expansion of Pi.
mathematica: ConsecutiveOccurrences1[alist_, n_] := Flatten @ Position[ Apply[ SameQ, Partition[ alist, n, 1], {1}], True]; ConsecutiveOccurrences1[ First[ RealDigits[Pi, 10, 252499]], 5]
author: _Harvey P. Dale_
extensions: Edited by _Robert G. Wilson v_, May 09 2003
